original: Åkesson, Hans Gustaf Wilhelm, rådman, v. krigsdomare, Vättersnäs, f. 6/6/96 i Stenbrohult, Kronob. 1., av överbanmäst. Hans Å. o. Hanna Mats-son. G. 34 m. Astrid Frykholm. Barn: Birgitta f. 35, Barbro 36, Monika 40, Gunilla 41. — Stud:ex. i Lund 14, jur. kand. där 21. E. o. not. i Skånska hovr. 21, i Göta hovr. 24, tingstjg. i Ingelstads o. Järrestads här. doms. 21-23, tf. fiskal i Göta hovr. 25, e. o. as-sess. 26, tf. rådman i Jönköp. sed. 30, v. krigsdom. v. Jönkö-p.-Kalm. reg. o. Göta ing:kår sed. s. å. Ordf. i bygg-n :nd i Jönköp. 47. RVO.
translated: Åkesson, Hans Gustaf Wilhelm, magistrate, deputy military judge, Vättersnäs, born on June 6, 1896 in Stenbrohult, Kronoberg County, eldest son of Senior Master Sergeant Hans Å. and Hanna Mats-son. Married in 1934 to Astrid Frykholm. Children: Birgitta (born 1935), Barbro (1936), Monika (1940), Gunilla (1941). Completed high school in Lund in 1914, law degree in 1921. Became a junior clerk in the Skåne Court of Appeal in 1921, in the Göta Court of Appeal in 1924, served as a magistrate in Ingelstad and Järrestad District Court from 1921 to 1923, temporary deputy judge in the Göta Court of Appeal in 1925, associate assessor in 1926, acting magistrate in Jönköping since 1930, deputy military judge in the Jönköping-Kalmar Regiment and Göta Engineer Corps since the same year. Chairman of the Building Committee in Jönköping in 1947. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
